Class ec.vatimpl.QueueOuterRunnable 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.meta.StdObj
           |
           +----ec.vatimpl.Inhabitant
                   |
                   +----ec.vatimpl.QueueOuterRunnable
public class QueueOuterRunnable
extends Inhabitant
implements Runnable
This is a Runnable whose purpose in life is to queue another runnable on the outer queue of a given vat. It's used in the wrapped version of ec.util.Timer.

QueueOuterRunnable(StandardVat, Runnable)
Create a new QueueOuterRunnable.
